text: Mike Tyson is currently testing out his one man live show in Las Vegas called Undisputed Truth 2 to small crowds, since Las Vegas is apparently pretty quiet right now. It doesn ’ t have anything to do with Tyson, but it may have something to do with that horrendous mass shooting at the Mandalay Bay earlier this year, which has seemingly gone through a massive media cover up, with no CCTV footage being released, along with the other major inconsistencies in the story. As a result, people just aren ’ t going to Las Vegas so much anymore. Anyway, moving back onto the story at hand. During Mike Tyson ’ s stand up performance, he said something which many people believe to be alarmingly true : “ Hillary is America ’ s most prolific serial killer – bar none. ” Tyson continued
